constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 29 (Monday, February 15, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DUNCAN:
H.R. 1048.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 17 grants Congress the
authority to pass laws related to ``needful buildings'' on
lands owned by the federal government. Also Article I,
Section 8, Clause 1 grants Congress the authority to
``provide for the common defence''.
[Page H514]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

title: To prohibit the transfer or release of individuals detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, to the United States.
